    Fields in org.apache.avro.util declared as ClassSecurityValidator.ClassSecurityPredicate
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ClassSecurityValidator.ClassSecurityPredicate
    ClassSecurityValidator.DEFAULT
    The default predicate that uses both the system properties and the hard-coded trusted classes.
    static final ClassSecurityValidator.ClassSecurityPredicate
    ClassSecurityValidator.DEFAULT_TRUSTED_CLASSES
    A couple of trusted classes that are safe to be loaded, instantiated with any constructors or alter any internals via reflection.
    static final ClassSecurityValidator.ClassSecurityPredicate
    ClassSecurityValidator.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES
    The predicate that uses the system properties "org.apache.avro.SERIALIZABLE_CLASSES" and "org.apache.avro.SERIALIZABLE_PACKAGES".
